body:
We are almost ready for settlement. We have just sent you an important email.

Cheers,
Back2bikes

This is an automated SMS, please do not reply.
name: 111-upload-inv

body:
Dear Back2bikes Admin, 
A new *|role|* user has been created at Back2bikes. 
*|nickname|* with email address *|email|* was created in the system at *|timestamp|*
name: convx-newuser

body:
Dear *|nickname|*, 
Please change your password by clicking [here.] (*|url|*)
name: convx-forgotpassword

body:
Dear *|nickname|*, 
This email confirms that your password has been changed on *|timestamp|*

name: password-change
app-500-new-user
body: A new *|role|* has been created with email address *|email|*
